VIDEO ATTACKS DATASET

iBeta level 1

The Dataset for successfully obtaining the iBeta Lab certificate in "Presentation Attack Detection" Level 1

  • Liveness Detection Techniques used to prevent fraudulent attempts to deceive an identifying system

Case Description

The Dataset for the iBeta Lab certificate in “Presentation Attack Detection” Level 1
Includes 28,300 videos of attacks from 50 unique people
Real videos and 6 types of attacks using: printed photos, photos attached to the cylinder, 3D masks, 2D masks, smartphone’s demonstration and computer screen’s demonstration
The attacks were filmed in various backgrounds, people used different attributes (medical mask and glasses)

Application areas of the dataset

  • 01.

    Facial Recognition

    Data in the dataset to develop and assess facial recognition algorithms, enhancing security systems, unlocking devices, and verifying identity
  • 02.

    Biometric Identification

    Computer vision to detect and authenticate individuals based on their unique physical characteristics, enabling secure access control systems
  • 03.

    Anti-spoofing

    Data in the dataset to train the system to detect a real person in a video
